      private boolean checkConnectionSuccess()
      Checks if the user has successfully connected to server; if not, the user is kicked with a popup error message
      Returns:

    • receiveData

      public void receiveData(GameLobby lobby, GameState gameState, List<String> actions, String username)
      Description copied from interface: GuiController
      Receives the data from the server and draws the correct scene
      Specified by:
      receiveData in interface GuiController
      Parameters:
      lobby - the current GameLobby of the game
      gameState - the current GameState
      actions - the list of actions the user can choose from
      username - the username of the user who receives the data
